title: Liebesabenteuer des Herrn Moliere
notes: 2007 Laurent Tirard French period comedy with Romain Duris as young Molière - fictionalized account of playwright's early years

title: Liebeswahn
notes: 2004 Roger Michell psychological thriller with Daniel Craig, Rhys Ifans based on Ian McEwan novel about obsessive stalking - distinctive ballooning accident opening

title: Limits of Control – Der geheimnisvolle Killer
notes: 2009 Jim Jarmusch mysterious Spanish crime film with Isaach De Bankolé as silent assassin - distinctive minimalist existential thriller

title: Little Voice – Stimme ihres Lebens
notes: 1998 Mark Herman film with Jane Horrocks, Michael Caine, Brenda Blethyn about shy girl who impersonates divas - distinctive singing performance

title: Marcello, Sommer der ersten Liebe
notes: 2008 Denis Dercourt French drama with Christa Théret as girl discovering love in Provence summer - distinctive coming-of-age story

title: Margin Call – Der große Crash
notes: 2011 J.C. Chandor debut ensemble drama with Kevin Spacey, Jeremy Irons, Zachary Quinto about 2008 financial crisis over 24 hours - distinctive Wall Street thriller

title: Marius >>> Fanny >> César
notes: 1931 Alexander Korda/Marcel Pagnol Marseille trilogy first part - or 2013 Daniel Auteuil remake, distinctive Provence waterfront setting

title: Massai, der große Apache (USA ´1954_/Trailer)
notes: 1954 Robert Aldrich Western with Burt Lancaster as Massai, last Apache warrior resisting surrender - distinctive revisionist Native American perspective

title: Maverick – Den Colt am Gür (USA ´94_Mel Gibson)
notes: 1994 Richard Donner Western comedy with Mel Gibson, Jodie Foster, James Garner in poker tournament - based on 1950s TV series
